comment: Mash in temp low, added 1 gal boiling water, got to around 152-153.  Down to 150 after an hour. No campden tabs. Ran out of propane, did boil on stove, slow rolling boil. Added yeast nutrient to boil. Chilled to around 65, shook carboy for aeration, pitched yeast, set in fridge, temp strip read around 60deg.
